hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file; case "$file" in *.py) make -s format-one-generic format-one-python FILE="$file" ;; *.yaml|*.yml) make -s format-one-generic format-one-yaml FILE="$file" ;; *.toml) make -s format-one-generic format-one-toml FILE="$file" ;; *) make -s format-one-generic FILE="$file" ;; esac; }
